duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide online occupational therapy services to students in Wyoming schools.
Use the state-of-the-art proprietary platform to deliver custom games, assessments, and evaluations.
Attend parent meetings and provide cross-licensing support to grow caseload and match availability.
Receive support from TinyEYE and access clinical mentors and an online community of therapists for guidance and celebration.
Maintain a designated workspace in a quiet, distraction-free environment to deliver therapy effectively.

education_certification.credential: Active licensure in home state that allows service to students in schools.
Capacity to provide a minimum of 10-15 hours per week within the typical school day.
Designated workspace in a quiet, distraction-free environment.
